mapper.select: SELECT erp_users.user_id, erp_users.login_id, erp_users.type_code, erp_users.status_code, erp_users.created_date, erp_users.modified_date, erp_roles.role_name FROM erp_users JOIN erp_user_roles ON erp_users.user_id = erp_user_roles.user_id JOIN erp_roles ON erp_user_roles.role_id = erp_roles.role_id WHERE login_id != 'admin'
SELECT user_id, login_id, login_password, type_code, status_code, created_date, modified_date FROM erp_users WHERE user_id = #{value}
SELECT user_id, login_id, login_password, type_code, status_code, created_date, modified_date FROM erp_users WHERE login_id = #{value}
SELECT user_id, login_id, login_password, type_code, status_code, created_date, modified_date FROM erp_users WHERE type_code = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO erp_users ( user_id, login_id, login_password, type_code, status_code, created_date, modified_date ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{loginId}, #{loginPassword}, #{typeCode}, #{statusCode}, NOW(), NOW() )
